attributes.action: call for the renaming of the vulgarly named energy drink
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.pussydrinks.com/
This should not have been allowed, it's not a suitable name for a product that people of all ages including children can buy. It encourages them to use vulgar/sexual words when they shouldn't be. This drink should be removed from all shops and banned unless it is renamed something more suitable.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
